page.title: 09Eynsford Parish Council
page.content: This includes 3 wards-Eynsford(5 members),Crockenhill(5 members)and Lullingstone(1member).The parish rate is 5.2p with 1.2p providing street ligthing.In Crockenhill the Parish Council owns, in order of size;The old Burying Ground at Darns Hill;the Green;the Cricket meadow at Stones Cross Road and Harvestfield behind Daltons Road.At Harvestfield recently 6acres of recreation ground was created from 27 acres of allotments.This new area is being managed with low maintenance to encourage wild -life.The Parish Council employs a clerk,working 20 hours a week; a maintenance man, who tidies & gardens P.C.land for 3 hours a week; a handiman ,who does odd jobs. The Eynsford & Crockenhill Rights of Way Group &the Lullingstone Park Committee were set up the P.C.
